div.h4: Hollister School campus closed. Virtual Learning only through May 15.
Meal distributions on Sundays and Wednesdays only - Students will receive 3 breakfasts and 3 lunches
Be sure to check out our Senior Class of 2020 Webpage

span.span: Instructional Resources for Parents and Students

span.a: Missouri Department of Health and Senior Services
Missouri Department of Elementary and Secondary Education

span.span: Burrell Crisis Hotline (do not have to be a patient): 417-761-5555
State of Missouri Crisis Hotline for Hearing Impaired: 1-888-380-3328 (TTY)
National Domestic Violence Hotline: 1-800-799-SAFE (7233) or TTY 1-800-787-3224
Network Resources for Stone & Taney Counties

u.strong: Hollister R-V School District and COVID-19

span.span: We are continuing to work closely with the Taney County Health Department and the Missouri Department of Elementary and Secondary Education to monitor COVID-19, the impact it is having on our area, and how we can best protect and serve our students.

font.span: Each day we acquire new information and assess the effect that information has on our students, families, staff, and current plans we have in place.
We will continue to communicate information through our regular communication channels, including, our automated messaging system and our district social media.
We have created this webpage to serve as a warehouse for information and will update it as current information changes or we have new information to share.

span.span: -Hollister School campus closed. Virtual Learning only through May 15.
-For best access points when utilizing the school guest wifi park in the following locations:
*South side of Hollister Middle School, facing the football stands
*West side of Hollister Middle School facing the LED sign
*East side of the Fieldhouse, facing the baseball field.
